column4: i'm having trouble getting ubuntu to boot consistently on this laptop that I am using and I've read that it's because it has an issue with my mini-pci card.  any idea how I can manually tell it what the device is?
[selfsearcher] : I did not.  I told him how to manually edit xorg.conf, I didn't have him run anything
to restart X no? It's normal btw.
he wasn't telling us of scrips lol
